mapper.select: select count(*) from luck_actor where luck_id = #{luckId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND is_winning = 1

select la.id,la.user_id,la.luck_id,la.is_winning, lp.id as price_id,lp.luck_prize,lp.num,lp.luck_pic, u.user_name,u.headimgurl from luck_actor as la LEFT JOIN luck_draw as ld on ld.id=la.luck_id LEFT JOIN luck_prize as lp on la.prize_id=lp.id LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=la.user_id where la.id = #{luckId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND la.is_winning = 1 order by id desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
